website_summaries.verdict: A great baby plate and placemat in one made out of sturdy silicone that is easy to clean.
pros: BPA, PVC, latex, and phthalate free
Includes a large placemat around the plate
cons: Suction is just OK and the placemat makes it a little bulky for travel

customer_reviews.title: These mats are great!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our ezpz mats! We have two, one for each kid - now 3.5 and 1.5 years old. They use their individual mats for EVERY meal, I just rinse after breakfast and lunch, but do a better scrub after dinner and we’ve never put them in the dishwasher. They dry really fast on the dish rack. We have not had any issues with the mats having and discoloration or loss of suction or odd smells, which are issues I’ve heard are common with other brands. The only negative is that they don’t travel well. My friend gifted this mat to us for my oldest’s one year birthday and I’m so glad she did!
customer_reviews.author: ~Rachooo

customer_reviews.title: Great with Lobster
customer_reviews.text: This is great, especially as a combo with the Lobster clip-on high chair. Although the manufacturer of the high chair says not to do it, it seems perfectly safe to clip the chair over this. That means the chair pins down the mat and the baby can't move it. That's great if your kid tends to throw plates. When not pinned by the high chair, it is relatively hard to move--it's pretty heavy and stays in place through friction. However, it is definitely possible to move once your baby gets the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Price Watcher

customer_reviews.title: Fat edges are the problem
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea however it took my son only 5 seconds after trying to pick it up from the edge of the bowl to go to the edge of the mat and pick up the whole mat. The edges are fat. Maybe if the edges were skinny that you needed a sharp tool or your nail to lift it up it would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Pulido

customer_reviews.title: we love it. We're going to order the smaller mat ...
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited when we saw the ad for the ex pz mat.We're grandparents that babysit daily and dumping her plate is her new phase. I can honestly say this mat lived up to it's expectations and more, we love it.We're going to order the smaller mat for her high chair and the bowl.Once her mother saw it she's ordering them also. I recommend every parent and grand parent order right now.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Di Iorio

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product that exceeds my expectations
customer_reviews.text: It's love. Our table is hand-me-down and the surface is no longer sealed completely as the previous owner tried to sand it. We own multiple brands of auction bowls and plates and nine stay longer than a minute at most. This may does! Sure, my daughter can move it with enough force but at 14 months she is more focused on her food. She does try for a moment here and there to grab the plate edge and pick it up or knock it over but I am present and engaged and distract her right away. She has yet to lift it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stevens

customer_reviews.title: The "eyes" hold the perfect amount of food for his daily ration and we ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 pound dog who has managed to move every type of bowl placed before him all over the kitchen, spilling food and water in the process. This hasn't moved from the place where we first put it down, much to his frustration. The "eyes" hold the perfect amount of food for his daily ration and we fill the "mouth" with water. I would have loved buying him the mats with actual bowls, but the price was more than I was willing to spend. I think this company can tap into the pet market if they made one mat with two bowls built into it! We love this!
customer_reviews.author: Putter

customer_reviews.title: No More Thrown Plates!
customer_reviews.text: This has been lifesaving for meals with a toddler. No more thrown plates and food on my walls! My floors, walls and carpets are so thankful for this product and I am too as a mother!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but...
customer_reviews.text: We loved the idea of this! A few things though 1- won't work on high chair tray because it's too big 2- my toddler immediately took it off the table 3- super easy to clean!!!! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept, poor execution. Go with a standard placemat
customer_reviews.text: Its a good size, not too big, not too large. The plate portion holds alot of food. It does stick to the table if you grab the plate part and pull straight up. But if you grab a corner, there is absolutely no resistance. My daughter has never once pulled straight up. Sweet potatoes and the ezpz ended up on the floor today. I like the plate part, but wouldn't buy again. I will buy just a standard placement, which is way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Dillman

customer_reviews.title: Oh this is perfect for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is so worth the money! Our little toddler loves to flip her plates and bowls over. We've tried everything and finally I saw this mat and thought, what the hey, we'll give it a try. I am so glad we did. We eat on a glass table and for dinners we sit her right up to the table now. She gets her very own cool mat which sticks to the table and she can be as messy as she wants. We throw it into the sink and it washes extremely easy. I am so glad we have this mat! :)
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Really nice better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I love it, especially if you have a toddle who wants to spill everything in the floor, I not saying the can't do it but it a lot harder for them. great product! a little big for traveling but great for the home or babysitter
customer_reviews.author: Bbear

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for a glass dinner table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my then 15 month old and LOVE IT! We have a glass dining table and it sticks perfectly! We use it literally every night and it has held up with out a stain, or mark or any issue at all. We do only hand wash it, but it just cleans so easily there is no need to do it any other way! I'll admit I looked at these for about 2 months before buying it because I felt the cost was a bit high, but it is worth every penny to not have to clean up after flying plates every night!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun Product, but Pricey
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I like how it includes the placemat and dish in one. It is great for my 1 year old. It lets him feel like one of his siblings with his own plate up to the table, but without the mess of upturning his bowl. It is a great design and so fun for my little ones. I only gave it 4 stars because it is pricey. There are other products on the market that are just as handy and useful, without the high price tag. I am glad that I bought this, but don't plan on buying more than one.
customer_reviews.author: NABumb

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: It’s big to travel with but I use it only at home. The only reason why the suction is not what I expected because I tired it on a wood table. It is better then the one I bought before.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Great for eating out
customer_reviews.text: We have two for our two toddlers and love them. We get asked about them nearly every time we go out! They are easy to wipe down and stick in a bag for traveling and hold on well to many surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: the lady

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: This plate is amazing. We had so many problems with our toddler throwing food off the table and for some reason she stopped when used this plate. I love the design and how it stick so solidly to our table. The three compartments are perfect for serving a variety of foods and in appropriate portions for a youngster. The extra area of the mat surrounding the dish has eliminated a lot of mess on our table as our child can use it as part of the plate a well. It's easy to wash and can be used in the microwave (if it fits). LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.author: NRK

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but it doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: In theory this is a great concept, but in reality it is easily outsmarted my an infant who wants to throw his food again. It seems to be worse on a wooden table, and more so if the table has a rounded edge. I have this too stars because it does function as a bowl, just not one that is difficult for babies to dump, and because the lip is so large that it has to be so far onto the table that little arms can't reach the food in it.
customer_reviews.author: kev994

customer_reviews.title: Love these mats
customer_reviews.text: Love these mats! It fits my sons meals perfectly. He is 14 months old and using his hands to eat and the edges of the happy face are just the right height for him to scoop his food out. The mats stay in place but my son (on the second day) figured out how to lift and pull the edges. I just have to be a smidge faster to push the bowl happy face part down before he flings it off of the table. Lots of surface area to hold down so I don't mind that he can still throw it (I mean it has to lift somehow, right?) easy to clean too. I have 2 green ones ✌
customer_reviews.author: ICEL

customer_reviews.title: Great / awesome / amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat/plate. It is amazing. Our son absolutely loves to put his hand flat on his tray and swish the food off! Once we got the mat, we cut it down to fit into his boon high chair tray and he was unable to swish his food off. Additionally, the tray makes it easy to separate his foods so he doesn't end up with a mush of everything. It helps me to determine what he likes and what he is so so about. As soon as he outgrows his high chair I will be purchasing an additional one for the table. I can't recommend this product enough. It is nowy standard go to gift for baby showers!
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME MAT!
customer_reviews.text: This item is amazing. I bought two for my twin grandsons. They cannot be pushed off the table or picked up. They do not have suction cups on it, but somehow stick to the table. I put my body weight against it and couldn't get it to slide on the counter. The dividers are of adequate size and easy for a child to eat from. My daughter loves them so much that she won't take her sons out to eat without having them. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: E. Bisby

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my baby's high chair. Too big for travel
customer_reviews.text: Suction power is great as long as you don't lift a millimeter of any corner, otherwise, you're good to go with any other bowl. I love that this is super easy to clean, but if after you clean it, the bottom part comes in contact with anything, the suction power decreases a ton.
customer_reviews.author: A.Q

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers learning to sit at the table
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Use it daily along with the bowl by ezpz. Love that it's dishwasher safe and doesn't harbor bacteria. This is perfect for my toddler who is transitioning to sitting at the table vs sitting in her highchair. Would definitely recommend to anyone with toddlers. Couldn't live without these mats. Use them for every meal. Shipping was also fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Gallivan

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Read a comment of how the food was tasteing like plastic. I was one of the lucky ones who can’t taste the plastic. We love it. I use it every single day and for each meal. Good cuality because I wash it three times a day and it’s still in great shape
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it's not the easiest thing to wash (I feel like I'm handling a floppy somewhat alive fish trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this but the mat is too large to fit on the high chair tray, my kid can lift it up and turn it over, and it's not the easiest thing to wash (I feel like I'm handling a floppy somewhat alive fish trying to wash it sometimes). My kid also seems to prefer the plates that the rest of the family is using and doesn't seem to appreciate having something different. Maybe I will use it more as a snack tray on the coffee table since it's not easy to knock over.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Our 9 month old does great with it
customer_reviews.text: We bought the EZPZ mat last week on the recommendation of some friends and our pediatrician. I left my husband at home feeding the baby and got a text halfway through the meal letting me know it was a total game changer. Our 9 month old does great with it... He tries to pull on it, but only by grabbing the bowl. I am guessing once he figures out pulling on the edge, it will be less useful for us, but right now, it's so helpful! We finally feel like we get to enjoy meals all together, rather than one person having to focus on feeding the baby while the other eats. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla P.

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not 100% toddler proof!
customer_reviews.text: It is very secure if your child just tries to pick it up by grabbing the bowl, but my 1 year old very quickly discovered that she could pick it up by lifting the edge. Nevertheless, we love to take it to restaurants because we don't have to choose between her breaking their dishes or putting her food on the dirty table. 90% of the time, we have no issue with her trying to lift up the corner so I still think it's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Hedge

customer_reviews.title: This is a lifesaver! You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my toddler and we LOVE it! It’s so easy to clean. I like the compartments, so I can separate her food. I use it for every single meal for her! One of my favorite kid products ever.
customer_reviews.author: Linnea C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fool my kid
customer_reviews.text: I like the mat, as a fun serving plate it works well. However the idea that it stays in place is not true for any kid with a little bit of smarts. I cleaned my smooth table, and then plopped this thing down. It was stuck where it was and wouldn't budge in any direction. My 1 year old, upon first use immediately grabbed the edges, peeled them up and pulled it off the table, spilling everything inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple other brands and this is the only one I had found to actually work. All others my 9 month old is able to pull off the table, with this when she is not.
customer_reviews.author: Celina Fraser

customer_reviews.title: The idea is nice, but then again it does not even fit ...
customer_reviews.text: After buying this, I honestly just think this thing is over priced. The idea is nice, but then again it does not even fit on my kids high chair. You need a flat surface in order to use it correctly. I guess this is nice if you don't use the tray to sit them at the table and instead use this mat, and also when you go eat at a restaurant. An okay product...
customer_reviews.author: Stugi

customer_reviews.title: SAVES SO MUCH TIME!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have two kids, and at the end of the day I spend so long cleaning that I'm always looking for shortcuts. This is great. When I use bowls, my 1 year old will tip them over and make a mess. This solves the problem! Plus, they just go straight in the dishwasher afterwards and all I have to do is clean the seat of the highchair. Honestly, I wish it had existed when I had my first kid. I have the OXO highchair and it fits well on the tray.
customer_reviews.author: amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: ... this on Shark Tank and thought it was a great idea but would it actually work if I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on Shark Tank and thought it was a great idea but would it actually work if I bought it? The answer is YES, YES, YES!! My husband tested the placemat/plate before introducing it to our son and was able to lift our table off the ground (counter height wood table). Our son is 1 1/2 and really strong so we knew he wouldn't be able to pull it off of the table. No more messes! Worth every penny! A definite must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works great but it's pretty large to carry to restaurants. You can't just throw it in the diaper bag. But it's large enough where my son can't immediately take it off of the table (like he does with a smaller one we have).
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: we have a slick/lacquered finish on our wooden dining table and the mat doesn't adhere at all- my 19 month old is easily able to
customer_reviews.text: This plate cuts way down on the amount of dishwashing/separate pieces needed at each mealtime. However, we have a slick/lacquered finish on our wooden dining table and the mat doesn't adhere at all- my 19 month old is easily able to move it around/sling it onto the floor. It does suction well to our granite countertop, but the suction aspect is useless on our table.
customer_reviews.author: CJLM

customer_reviews.title: No more flipped plates!
customer_reviews.text: This product has really helped my 1 1/2 year old est better at the table. Now she can’t flip her plate over. That used to be a constant struggle. She did learn to peal it up immediately but I just love her arm from the corner a few times and usually she will just leave it alone. It’s a lot bigger and heavier then I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Great mat to keep at the house.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat but have had to come back and deduct a star. It works great and I probably saved the price of the mat on food not being tossed in the first week alone. Having said that... It is a beast and DO NOT think you are gonna roll this up and tuck it in your diaper bag. It would be product of the year if you could figure out a way to make it more travel friendly or at least offer a smaller, maybe face only/mat free, version.
customer_reviews.author: Bram Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! So far so good. My son is turning 1 in two weeks and he wanted to feel like he was eating with us at the table. He likes throwing plates and bowls on the floor, so I read reviews on this and fell in love. The suction on this is awesome. Make sure you have a flat surface. Clean both sides before placing! Love how easy it is to wash 😍
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Great trays to use for our little one
customer_reviews.text: Great trays to use for our little one. Even though within minutes he had figured out how to pull up the sides (hes 2 yrs old and very smart for his age evidently) we still use this all the time because he cannot knock it off the table and we can stop him if he tries to reach for the sides. Also the mat works great at catching spills that come from a 2 year old learning to use a fork and spoon, which makes clean up a breeze since nothing gets on the table. It sticks very well to all hard surfaces, even the cloth tabletop of his little kid table.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany A. Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Mom & Babe Approved
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Suctions to most surfaces to make moving (or throwing) the plate near impossible. Picks up easily if you lift corner. Washes easily, too- dishwasher safe! Microwave safe. GREAT product for tiny humans that like to make a MESS. Fun colors :)
customer_reviews.author: CinAnH

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 of these for my 2 1/2 yr grandson to use when not sitting at the table to eat. My daughter and grandson love it so much I bought a second! My grandson even seems to eat better using them..keeps each food separate. Expensive, but very well made, will not slip and slide on the table and clean up is a breeze! This goes through the dishwasher, no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Denise M

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy! Sticks to countertop and table well
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! Sticks to countertop and table well. Only downside is that it will not fit over the high chair. My son can pick it up but it still serves it's purpose very well! I plan on purchasing the smaller (oval) version so I can use over high chair. Over all I'm very satisfied with this product! TY!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra P.

customer_reviews.title: I love this for my busy and messy grandson
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my busy and messy grandson. Although he can somewhat move it, I'm able to catch him attempting to and I stop him before disaster strikes. It's very durable and easy to clean and store. I plan to order another item that comes with a bowl. When my grand kids visit, they can use them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Just right for little hands. A bit heavier than I expected so traveling with it might be a burden as it doesn't fold up. We've already tested it's strength sticking to the high chair tray and it held its own nicely. Just wish it was easier to take along with us to restaurants and such.
customer_reviews.author: kjrogers

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product, but I wish the placemat was larger
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but I wish the placemat was larger. It would also be nice if they made just placemats without the plate option as well. They should also consider making a placemat that works better for round tables too! I know a lot of people who have round tables in their kitchens who would like that option as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: But he was so happy and busy eating from it that he forgot all ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely A Must have for every mom!! Although my toddler took just 2 meals to figure out how to release the whole plate up. But he was so happy and busy eating from it that he forgot all about it the next day. No mess on the dining table, kid can eat from the plate or from the built in place mat, its amazing. Hassle free post meal cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Sinu Nair

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay...
customer_reviews.text: Product is just okay. I like that it is super easy to wipe down between meals, but my one year old promptly peeled it off the table and threw it on the floor. The whole point of buying it was so that he would stop throwing his plate on the floor at every meal. We will still use it, but it does not live up to the hype (or the price).
customer_reviews.author: Nichole K.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to try this mat for a while and went ahead and purchased it at a discount on prime day. When it arrived I was taken aback by how think it was, I was expecting a flimsy sheet of silicone similar to a cheap placemat. I was so wrong. This may is heavy duty, the weight alone will keep your child from throwing it across the room. I am sad I didn't buy this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small children!
customer_reviews.text: This plate has incredible suction power! It’s always very easy to clean in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: James Edwards

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Happy Mat for my 1 year old and have purchased 2 more as gifts. They are fantastic for feeding babies and toddlers at the table, especially when at a restaurant! If you peel the corner, it comes up easily but it never budges if you pull from the bowl portion. It's a breeze to clean in the dishwasher or sink. I definitely recommend this product, it's made going out to eat so easy with our little one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 14 month old son. He seemed ready to "graduate" from high chair with a tray to booster at the table, but he is definitely in a "grab and throw the plate" phase. This mat sticks very well to our glossy wooden table, even with his attempts to pull it off (mom and dad can easily remove it though!). This is exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: bdoubleu

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, however I wish I had bought the smaller one. It's to large for most high chair trays ( I have two) and baby can pick it up which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Deadra Henson

customer_reviews.title: We love it! When I first read the reviews about ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 1/2 year old grandson. We love it! When I first read the reviews about how other children figured out they could lift the edges to move it, I wasn't sure about spending that much on it. He can lift up the edges which doesn't really matter because he is more concerned about eating and not about moving around the mat. It sticks really good to the table and he loves eating out of it. I also love he can eat anything out of it, including spaghetti, and it doesn't stain it. Getting ready to buy the bowl. I am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Good design for 6+ months
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and it works as advertised, although my 17-month old figured out how to release the suction and flip the plate within a few meals. Would definitely recommend for 6+ months just starting to eat solids. Very easy to clean/rinse and flexible for storing in various size cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: E.L.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was able to easily throw it on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I got this hoping to make dinner time easier with my toddler, but unfortunately I couldn't get it to stick to our table. My daughter was able to easily throw it on the floor. This problem is probably due to the construction of our table, it is made of reclaimed wood and doesn't provide an even enough surface for this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the mat and use it three times a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the mat and use it three times a day. We now have my daughter (19 months) sitting right at the table in a booster. It keeps things relatively mess-free. However, if she's in a bad mood, she can easily lift this from the edges and try to move it. It does not stay perfectly like they say. It's heavy though, so most of the time I can take it away from her before this happens. Very easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ante

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest thing since sliced bread! Child cannot pry it up off the highchair or table. Child loves the compartments, Easy to clean. Heavy duty, well-built, practical, will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: impressive
customer_reviews.text: Amazing so far. Its only been once meal my 15 year old could pull the mat off & throw it. Its "magic" bc there are not specific suction cups on bottom. But the weight and thickness of mat make it suction to table. Very excited to tey in restaurant, bc im tired of baby smearing food all over table and/or destroying the "temporary" Mats and children's menus
customer_reviews.author: Mary Chavarria

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mat for going out to eat.
customer_reviews.text: We take this mat with us whenever we bring our toddler along to dinner. Many servers have commented on how great the idea is and I'm sure they appreciate the fact that it helps keep the mess to a minimum. On a smooth surface it holds extremely well. Just watch out for tile table tops and the like because it won't get quite the same seal.
customer_reviews.author: mckenziedrums

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson who is two years old. It is wonderful for keeping hot and cold food separate. It does not slide on the table top. Clean up around his plate is easier and it washes up well in the dishwasher. His mother loves it too! It was a very worthwhile purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I can't even get over this product!! I slapped this bad boy down on the counter, grabbed a hold of the little face, held on and leaned ALL of my body weight back trusting that it would keep its promise and stay securely stuck to the counter. And guess what?!? It totally did!! I've yet to have my grandson try it, but so far I'm super impressed!! This technology would work great for dog bowls too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this product and it does suck down nicely to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and it does suck down nicely to the table. HOWEVER, my 21 month old son immediately figured out how to put his finger underneath the edge to pry it off the table. He thinks this is funny so we constantly have to watch him and make sure he doesn't flip the mat upside down. I think this would be an excellent product for younger kids. I switched my son over to a regular toddler plate and he leave that alone. Probably though the EZPZ was more like a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Texas shopper

customer_reviews.title: stays put, sturdily made, helps baby learn to use a spoon
customer_reviews.text: I like how it stays put on the table. Hard for the baby to flip it over. Not impossible ;), but just hard enough. Easy to clean. Really sturdy. We use it every day and after 6 months it still looks brand new. The vertical sides to the compartments are good for baby learning to scoop food with a spoon.
customer_reviews.author: joules

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't praise this item enough! It works extremely well. The only downside is, I wish I had another one! I've seen some mamas complain that their kids can lift the edges and pull it up. I haven't had an issue with this, but maybe it's because my son is too much into eating to bother playing with it yet. :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bell

customer_reviews.title: Solving a problem!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on Shark Tank and immediately thought of my grandson who has Downs Syndrome and has a habit of throwing his dish when he's done with his meal. I haven't yet heard how it's working out, but hopefully he's using it and my daughter's not having a problem with thrown dishes anymore!
customer_reviews.author: P. Senecal

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great and it does the job
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great and it does the job. I like that it stays put and is like a plate and mat in one. I wish these products were cheaper. That's the only drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't slide around the table and easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a couple weeks now and my 9 month old hasn't been able to throw it on the ground. Just today she lifted the corner of the mat, but didn't take it off the table. It doesn't slide around the table and easy to wash. Such a cute item!
customer_reviews.author: Rita L

customer_reviews.title: I love this placemat
customer_reviews.text: I love this placemat! So easy to use! Just fill it up in the kitchen and carry it to the table (it's sturdy as long as you hold it under the center). It creates a seal with the table and therefore will not scoot no matter how hard you try. It's not sticky or anything so you can still easily pick it up. Then when they are done eating you can put it in the dishwasher or it is easily hand washed.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan & Shayna

customer_reviews.title: Great but too big for our highchair tray!
customer_reviews.text: While I liked the mat, it just didn't work for us. It was too big for our highchair tray. It felt well made overall and we got the round mat instead.
customer_reviews.author: Filip P.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pull, easy to peel
customer_reviews.text: So far pretty great. Cannot be pulled up! 4/5 cause I'm pretty sure eventually my kid will learn to peel it up from the sides. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Alonge

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion... A parenting must-have
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this product!! I have a "plate thrower" and this has completely eliminated that problem. So easy to clean. The placemat really contains the mess. My kiddo loves the bright color and I do too! This plate is just fun. I can't wait to get more to add to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Corban

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but my son 11 months old figured out ...
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but my son 11 months old figured out how to roll the sides up and turn it over... Which was just another mess. I put it away for a few months thinking that I had made the mistake of removing the dish in front of him. I just brought it back out (now 14 months) and he did the same exact thing.
customer_reviews.author: John Billings

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: This child's one piece place-mat and plate was one of my best purchases lately. The 2 year old was just starting to throw the plates and bowls off the table and this has stopped that - although I do have to say the two year old has figured out how to peal it up from the corner of the mat - but - has not pulled it all the way off the table (it sticks to the table as advertised & doesn't leave a mark). It's easy to clean as well. When I purchased I thought the product was made in the USA, but after receiving it found it was made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I feel that these give my son more confidence when he’s eating. They don’t move at all and I love the cute colors. They hold plenty of food too. Very easy cleanup!
customer_reviews.author: Rylee Elizabeth Hillis

customer_reviews.title: Great for eating out!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! Bought for my Grandson - we use it at every meal and always take it with us when we eat out. Sturdy, no plastic smell, easy to clean - I just pop it in my dishwasher. Very high quality product - you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jody A Limbacher

customer_reviews.title: We love this mat
customer_reviews.text: We love this mat! It stays on the table so well that when you grab the bowl you'll move the table before ever moving the bowl. This is really helping to break my sons habit of throwing his bowl/plate on the floor. He doesn't even try anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Bigbie

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. It's catches most spills from landing on the table then chairs then floor. My favorite thing is that it practically suctions to the table ... no more dumping the plate/bowl onto the floor! It's so frustrating for my 15 month old grand daughter. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It is super easy to clean and is great for messy eaters ...
customer_reviews.text: If your child is learning to eat, buy this! This thing holds to tables and high chair tables! It is super easy to clean and is great for messy eaters or for kids who want to throw things off the table. Bought one for our house and one for our parents house!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene and Mark

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this mat
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this mat. As long as the bottom is clean, it sticks to the table very well. It holds plenty of food and cleans up easily. Only down side- it is a little too large to put in the tray of our (keekaroo) high chair. We just pull the chair up to the dinner table without the tray, and the mat works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nauseating plastic odor
customer_reviews.text: The smell emitting from this happy mat was nauseating. I washed it several times and left it on our counter for a couple weeks, but I still couldn't stand the plastic odor. It seems well constructed; I like how it's one continuous piece so that nothing could get stuck in crevices, though with the strong odor, I didn't trust it to put our baby's food on it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Prevents dumped food for 11 month old
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the only "plates" my 11 month son doesnt grab & throw or dump on the floor. Con: Doesnt fit on our high chair tray.
customer_reviews.author: spt88432

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY! No more plates on the floor!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried suction cups, OXO products, didn't matter. My baby could pick them up and throw it to the floor when he was finished. It over hangs my son's high chair table, but because of the floppy edges it was very hard for him to lift (not impossible) and gave me plenty of time to bust him. It is perfect on our coming room table. Especially if slightly moist. PLUS it helps protect my table from fork stabs. Only suggestion would be to have the raised plate closer to the edge of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was kind of disappointed as they made it seem like the whole thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Was kind of disappointed as they made it seem like the whole thing suctions to the table when in reality it is only when it is pulled on from the very top. My little one likes to peel the sides....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of the mat but it did not ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of the mat but it did not fit on my high char properly so my son is still able to lift it. It also doesn't always suction to some surfaces. I also wish it was a bit more sturdy so I could carry it with one hand. I do like that there is a large edge so most of the mess stays there and it can go directly in the dishwasher. It is cute, durable, and dishwasher safe. Overall its more cute than functional for the price you pay. I feel you can get somewhat similar things for a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Not terribly impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Took all of 2 minutes for my 22 month old to figure out to pull from a corner and flip it. Not terribly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, son too smart
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, son too smart. We bought this when my son was about 18 months old. Its a great idea, but he figured out how to remove it about 3 mins in to first use
customer_reviews.author: Devon Litzsinger

customer_reviews.title: Great mealtime assistant
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We have one for my daughter and just bought one for my son who has graduated from high chair to sitting at the table with the family. Makes dinner easier knowing they can’t hurl dishes around!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: They work but are a little big. The food area of the mat is perfect size but a lot of area used for the mat part. it may need this to help it stay in place. Seems a little much to me.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: No more messes.
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product. My granddaughter was always throwing her plate on the floor. Not any more. Plus she loves the smiley face design. Clean up is a breeze now. Love this and the quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: EFD

customer_reviews.title: Great even for a wild child!
customer_reviews.text: I have a wild child who loves to throw her food everywhere. She did get this mat up after sitting with it for about 5 minutes, BUT we sit with her and can catch her before she can get it off of the table. We have a little cutout around the edge of our table and I think that is why she can get it up, but I do like it and definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: We love these plates
customer_reviews.text: We love these plates. They do stick best on glass of course but the weight of them alone is pretty difficult for my 14 month old to pick up. They wash really nice and the quality is much better thAn competing brands. We have all different ones and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best baby buy yet! Sticks excellent to our granite counter tops, cleans so easily and we like the different compartments! It's very high quality material. Great green color too! It's the only baby/child placemat or bowl or plate we will ever need to buy
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! We take these whenever we go out to eat so that the little one can’t dump the plate on the floor. My only complaint is that they are clunky to store in our small kitchen but I still recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: LShum

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We love the ezpz mat! So cute and my son loves eating his snacks on it. I love that it’s dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I got it over a year ago and it's still looks new. My son loves the smiley face
customer_reviews.author: Danica

customer_reviews.title: ... out to eat a lot and these mats work great with keeping food on the table (when not being ...
customer_reviews.text: We go out to eat a lot and these mats work great with keeping food on the table (when not being tossed down anyway). We keep one in the car and one in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Moon 2 Dance 2

customer_reviews.title: Who knows????
customer_reviews.text: A bit premature and pushy in seeking a review. Tried to give a neutral review...this is being given as a gift, so must reserve judgment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much have bout as gifts
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much have bout as gifts. without suction cups, it somehow clings to the table which eliminates your child from heaving the whole plate across the table. this is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Peat

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, not the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My son tried to pick it up and he wanted to so bad but was unable. Saves us a lot of mess! Easy to clean! The wonky downfall is they are a little pricey. I'd like to get a few more so I can throw them in the dishwasher and have another on hand but at the price point, makes this a difficult decision if it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MegD

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I wish they had this in smaller sizes ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw this being used on "Itjudylife" and was interested in trying out. We use it when we eat out. We just fold it and put in a clear plastic bag. It works great. I wish they had this in smaller sizes so it is more travel friendly.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This placemat is awesome! When I ordered it I thought it would suction to the table somehow but instead it's just a silicone placemat. I'm not disappointed at all though. My son loves it and although he can pick it up l, if he tries to slide it it won't budge. I'd recommend this placemat for the growing toddler in your home. It's a plus that it's dishwasher safe so clean up is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Porter

product_meta.title: ezpz Happy Mat (Lime) - 100% Silicone Suction Plate with Built-in Placemat for Toddlers + Preschoolers - Divided Plate - Dishwasher Safe
product_meta.description: Color:LimeThe ezpz Happy Mat is an all-in-one placemat + plate that suctions to the table, which means that it captures the mess and eliminates tipped bowls and plates. The Happy Mat's three compartments remind parents to serve a fruit or veggie, protein and carbohydrate and the smiley face design puts kids in the right mood for a positive mealtime experience. Portion sizes (the eyes and smile) are catered to toddlers at 4oz, 4oz and 10oz. Made from high quality silicone that is BPA, BPS, PVC, lead, latex and phthalate free. 6+ months. Dimensions: 15 x 10 x 1.
feature_bullets: All-in-one placemat + plate contains the mess
Placemat suctions to any flat surface to reduce tipped bowls / plates
Smiley face design puts kids in the right mood for a positive mealtime experience
Promotes self-feeding and develops fine motor skills
Made from high quality silicone that is BPA, BPS, PVC, latex and phthalate free
Built to last (silicone is bendable and doesn't fade or corrode)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars586 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material type free: BPS Free, BPA Free, Phthalate Free, Latex Free, Lead Free
